newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary to announce energy price on Monday - ministry.
newsitem.headline: Hungary to announce energy price on Monday - ministry.

text.p: Hungary's Industry and Trade Ministry said on Friday it would decide on the quarterly energy price increase on Monday.
"The decision will be made on Monday and we will publish the information probably via a statement," Tamas Lindenberger of the ministry's press department told Reuters.

The Hungarian market was expecting a decision on Friday as the new gas price would significantly influence the earnings of oil and gas company MOL Rt, which said it expected the government to fulfill its promise of an eight percent profit margin for energy companies.

Since January, Hungarian energy prices have been revised quarterly based on a formula of the energy bill. Revisions are based on recommendations of the Energy Office and the Industry and Trade Ministry has the final authority.
